attributes.action: make it an automatic 10yr prison sentance with out trial for carrying a knife
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Also to make it a minimum 30 yr sentence to use a knife to attack or wound.  
Further more to make it mean life in prison for the use of a knife or gun causing death ... 
Also for it to be a automatic 30 yr sentence for carrying a gun and life for using a gun causing death.
